chinese: 彤弓弨兮、受言藏之。我有嘉賓、中心貺之。鐘鼓既設、一朝饗之。
english: The red bows unbent,Were received and deposited.I have here an admirable guest,And with all my heart I bestow one on him.The bells and drums have been arranged in order,And all the morning will I feast him.

chinese: 彤弓弨兮、受言載之。我有嘉賓、中心喜之。鐘鼓既設、一朝右之。
english: The red bows unbent,Were received and fitted on their frames.I have here an admirable guest,And with all my heart I rejoice in him.The bells and drums have been arranged in order,And all the morning will I honour him.

chinese: 彤弓弨兮、受言櫜之。我有嘉賓、中心好之。鐘鼓既設、一朝醻之。
english: The red bows unbent,Were received and placed in their cases.I have here an admirable guest,And with all my heart I love him.The bells and drums have been arranged in order,And all the morning will I pledge him.
